trans-unit.source: Integrating Data From SAP HDI Containers

seg-source.mrk: Integrating Data From SAP HDI Containers

target.mrk: 从 SAP HDI 容器集成数据

trans-unit.source: Access SAP HANA Cloud Deployment Infrastructure (HDI) containers through <pname conkeyref="loio355f3590b9984e58929515541d44e10e/SAP-DWC-LONG"/> and use your data in the <uicontrol>Data Builder</uicontrol> or gain access to your space data from your HDI container.

seg-source.mrk: Access SAP HANA Cloud Deployment Infrastructure (HDI) containers through <pname conkeyref="loio355f3590b9984e58929515541d44e10e/SAP-DWC-LONG"/> and use your data in the <uicontrol>Data Builder</uicontrol> or gain access to your space data from your HDI container.

target.mrk: 通过 <pname conkeyref="loio355f3590b9984e58929515541d44e10e/SAP-DWC-LONG"/> 访问 SAP HANA Cloud 部署基础架构（HDI）容器，并在<uicontrol>数据模型构建器</uicontrol>中使用你的数据，或从 HDI 容器访问你的空间数据。

seg-source.mrk: What's an HDI container?

target.mrk: 什么是 HDI 容器？

trans-unit.source: The SAP HANA Cloud Deployment Infrastructure, or HDI for short, provides a service that enables you to deploy database development artifacts to so-called containers. This service describes the deployed (run-time) state of SAP HANA database artifacts, for example: tables, views, or procedures, which have been created or adjusted by the SAP Integrated Development Environment (WebIDE) editors as a family of consistent design-time artifacts for all key SAP HANA platform database features. These artifacts are modeled, staged (uploaded), built, and deployed into SAP HANA Cloud.

seg-source.mrk: The SAP HANA Cloud Deployment Infrastructure, or HDI for short, provides a service that enables you to deploy database development artifacts to so-called containers.

This service describes the deployed (run-time) state of SAP HANA database artifacts, for example: tables, views, or procedures, which have been created or adjusted by the SAP Integrated Development Environment (WebIDE) editors as a family of consistent design-time artifacts for all key SAP HANA platform database features.
These artifacts are modeled, staged (uploaded), built, and deployed into SAP HANA Cloud.

target.mrk: SAP HANA Cloud 基础架构（缩写 HDI）提供的服务让你可以将数据库开发项目部署到所谓的容器。
此服务描述表、视图或程序等 SAP HANA 数据库项目的部署（运行时）状态，这些项目已通过 SAP 集成开发环境（WebIDE）编辑器创建或调整，作为所有关键 SAP HANA 平台数据库功能的一致设计时项目系列。
这些项目已建模、暂存（上载）、构建并部署到 SAP HANA Cloud。

trans-unit.source: For more information on the SAP HANA Cloud Deployment Infrastructure, see <xref format="html" href="https://help.sap.com/viewer/c2cc2e43458d4abda6788049c58143dc/cloud/en-US/4077972509f5437c85d6a03e01509417.html" scope="external">SAP HANA Cloud Deployment Infrastructure (HDI) Reference</xref>.

seg-source.mrk: For more information on the SAP HANA Cloud Deployment Infrastructure, see <xref format="html" href="https://help.sap.com/viewer/c2cc2e43458d4abda6788049c58143dc/cloud/en-US/4077972509f5437c85d6a03e01509417.html" scope="external">SAP HANA Cloud Deployment Infrastructure (HDI) Reference</xref>.

target.mrk: 有关 SAP HANA Cloud 部署基础架构的更多信息，请参见 <xref format="html" href="https://help.sap.com/viewer/c2cc2e43458d4abda6788049c58143dc/cloud/en-US/4077972509f5437c85d6a03e01509417.html" scope="external">SAP HANA Cloud 部署基础架构（HDI）参考</xref>。

trans-unit.source: Why would you need to access HDI containers?

seg-source.mrk: Why would you need to access HDI containers?

target.mrk: 为什么需要访问 HDI 容器？

trans-unit.source: If you already have HDI containers and would like to use existing data models in your <pname conkeyref="loio355f3590b9984e58929515541d44e10e/SAP-DWC-LONG"/> environment you can easily make them accessible in your space. You can then work with the models by enriching them or using them for a Story.

seg-source.mrk: If you already have HDI containers and would like to use existing data models in your <pname conkeyref="loio355f3590b9984e58929515541d44e10e/SAP-DWC-LONG"/> environment you can easily make them accessible in your space.
You can then work with the models by enriching them or using them for a Story.

target.mrk: 如果你已经有 HDI 容器并想在 <pname conkeyref="loio355f3590b9984e58929515541d44e10e/SAP-DWC-LONG"/> 环境中使用现有数据模型，可在你的空间中将其轻松设为可访问。
然后，你可以使用这些模型，例如丰富数据或将其用于故事。

trans-unit.source: You could also allow your space data to be consumed in your HDI containers. Then you can work with the models that you created in <pname conkeyref="loio355f3590b9984e58929515541d44e10e/SAP-DWC-LONG"/> within your HDI environment.

seg-source.mrk: You could also allow your space data to be consumed in your HDI containers.
Then you can work with the models that you created in <pname conkeyref="loio355f3590b9984e58929515541d44e10e/SAP-DWC-LONG"/> within your HDI environment.

target.mrk: 还可以允许在 HDI 容器中使用空间数据。
然后，你可以在 HDI 环境中使用在 <pname conkeyref="loio355f3590b9984e58929515541d44e10e/SAP-DWC-LONG"/> 中创建的模型。

seg-source.mrk: What are the prerequisites?

target.mrk: 先决条件有哪些？

trans-unit.source: The following roles need to be assigned to your HDI container:

seg-source.mrk: The following roles need to be assigned to your HDI container:

target.mrk: 需要将以下角色分配到你的 HDI 容器：

trans-unit.source: <codeph>DWC_CONSUMPTION_ROLE</codeph> - e.g select on the required tables

seg-source.mrk: <codeph>DWC_CONSUMPTION_ROLE</codeph> - e.g select on the required tables

target.mrk: <codeph>DWC_CONSUMPTION_ROLE</codeph> - 例如在所需表中选择

trans-unit.source: <codeph>DWC_CONSUMPTION_ROLE#</codeph> - this role has all the privileges from <codeph>DWC_CONSUMPTION_ROLE</codeph>, but with the additional grantable option

seg-source.mrk: <codeph>DWC_CONSUMPTION_ROLE#</codeph> - this role has all the privileges from <codeph>DWC_CONSUMPTION_ROLE</codeph>, but with the additional grantable option

target.mrk: <codeph>DWC_CONSUMPTION_ROLE#</codeph> - 此角色拥有 <codeph>DWC_CONSUMPTION_ROLE</codeph> 中的所有权限，但含有附加的可授予选项

trans-unit.source: How to acces your HDI containers?

seg-source.mrk: How to acces your HDI containers?

target.mrk: 如何访问 HDI 容器？

trans-unit.source: There are a few steps you need to take if you want to access your HDI container or if you want your HDI container to consume the models and data from your space. For both scenarios, you need to create an SAP ticket so we can map your HDI container with your <pname conkeyref="loio355f3590b9984e58929515541d44e10e/SAP-DWC-LONG"/> space.

seg-source.mrk: There are a few steps you need to take if you want to access your HDI container or if you want your HDI container to consume the models and data from your space.
For both scenarios, you need to create an SAP ticket so we can map your HDI container with your <pname conkeyref="loio355f3590b9984e58929515541d44e10e/SAP-DWC-LONG"/> space.

target.mrk: 如果你想访问 HDI 容器或希望 HDI 容器使用空间中的模型和数据，需要执行一些步骤。
对于这两个方案，你都需要创建 SAP 支持工单，以便我们建立 HDI 容器与 <pname conkeyref="loio355f3590b9984e58929515541d44e10e/SAP-DWC-LONG"/> 空间之间的映射关系。

trans-unit.source: For a simple step-by-step guide to get started see <xref format="html" href="https://help.sap.com/viewer/69221ae34e4244829841d6fe557d68e4/CLOUD/en-US/a94e1637db484a5c8ec2da83cfa75156.html" scope="external">Mapping your HDI Container to your Space</xref>.

seg-source.mrk: For a simple step-by-step guide to get started see <xref format="html" href="https://help.sap.com/viewer/69221ae34e4244829841d6fe557d68e4/CLOUD/en-US/a94e1637db484a5c8ec2da83cfa75156.html" scope="external">Mapping your HDI Container to your Space</xref>.

target.mrk: 有关简单的入门分步指南，请参阅<xref format="html" href="https://help.sap.com/viewer/69221ae34e4244829841d6fe557d68e4/CLOUD/en-US/a94e1637db484a5c8ec2da83cfa75156.html" scope="external">将 HDI 容器映射到空间</xref>。

seg-source.mrk: Privileges

target.mrk: 特许权限

trans-unit.source: List the current available user privileges with the following statement <codeph>select * from effective_privileges where user_name = current_user;</codeph>:

seg-source.mrk: List the current available user privileges with the following statement <codeph>select * from effective_privileges where user_name = current_user;</codeph>:

target.mrk: 使用以下语句 <codeph>select * from effective_privileges where user_name = current_user;</codeph> 列出当前可用的用户特许权限：

trans-unit.source: The HDI role is granted to the <pname conkeyref="loio355f3590b9984e58929515541d44e10e/SAP-DWC-LONG"/> users when atached to a space

seg-source.mrk: The HDI role is granted to the <pname conkeyref="loio355f3590b9984e58929515541d44e10e/SAP-DWC-LONG"/> users when atached to a space

target.mrk: <pname conkeyref="loio355f3590b9984e58929515541d44e10e/SAP-DWC-LONG"/> 用户附加到空间时，为其授予 HDI 角色

target.mrk: 数据库用户使用 HDI 容器中的数据
